hero: We assist companies, organisations and business clients within a wide range of markets.

footer.title: Stray Vyrje assists companies, organisations and business clients within a wide range of markets. Our attorneys have extensive experience in Business and Private Law, Sports and Intellectual Property Rights.

content.p1: Areas of actuation comprises of Labour, Contract and Corporate Law. In addition our lawyers have significant experience with negotiation and litigation.
content.p2: As a client with Stray Vyrje you will meet solution-oriented lawyers that are dedicated and available.
content.p3: Contact one of our partners today, to explore what we can achieve together.
